name: Unidos Contra CoVid-19
description:
The game has a didactic intro about the CoVid-19 and 4 mini-games whose theme revolves around preventive measures against its spread. 

In the first minigame the player must choose whether or not the person should leave their confinament based on their need. In the second you have to clean with soap as many hands as possible. The objective of the third is to stop the virus with a mask. Finally, the player will have to clap at the rhythm set by the icons.
